citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The current environmental enhancement plan is inadequate to provide for enrichment of a singly housed American crow
without visual access to other species. The current plan prescribes housing of the crow with other crows when available
on the premises, including rehabilitation animals. The licensee also expressed that keys, toys, and other enrichment
objects may be used, though these offerings are not tracked. On inspection, however, a single small ball is the only toy
available in the enclosure and the licensee shared that a partner bird has not been available for cohabitation since the
previous inspection in October, 2024. Failure to provide adequate, continuous enrichment of this highly intelligent, social
species, especially when singly housed, may compromise psychological welfare. The facility must amend its enrichment
plan to develop species-appropriate enrichment, approved by the attending veterinarian, for singly housed individuals of
social species.
Correct by January 10, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.154(c)(4) 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The current environmental enhancement plan is inadequate to provide for enrichment of a singly housed American crow 
without visual access to other species. The current plan prescribes housing of the crow with other crows when available 
on the premises, including rehabilitation animals. The licensee also expressed that keys, toys, and other enrichment 
objects may be used, though these offerings are not tracked. On inspection, however, a single small ball is the only toy 
available in the enclosure and the licensee shared that a partner bird has not been available for cohabitation since the 
previous inspection in October, 2024. Failure to provide adequate, continuous enrichment of this highly intelligent, social 
species, especially when singly housed, may compromise psychological welfare. The facility must amend its enrichment 
plan to develop species-appropriate enrichment, approved by the attending veterinarian, for singly housed individuals of 
social species.  
 
Correct by January 10, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
